text: Shipwrecked () is a 1990 Norwegian Fijian family adventure movie directed by Nils Gaup and was based on the novel by Oluf Falck-Ytter. It stars Gabriel Byrne, Stian Smestad, Trond Peter Stams√∏ Munch, Knut Walle and was distributed Buena Vista Pictures. ==Other websites== * Category:1990 adventure movies Category:1990s family movies Category:Norwegian adventure movies Category:Fijian movies Category:American adventure movies Category:American family movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Nils Gaup
title: Shipwrecked (1990 movie)
